alert.note: Alert for Nelson; Spencer (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 4:14PM EDT until August 06 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Spencer County in central Kentucky... Northeastern Nelson County in central Kentucky... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 414 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Taylorsville to 6 miles north of Bardstown, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Taylorsville, Bloomfield, Wakefield, Chaplin and Coxs Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
